title: How raw sugar is made from cane
brief_description: Shows all stages in the manufacture of raw sugar from cane; initial crushing of the cane; extraction of raw sugar from the juice; the bagging and storage of the raw product and finally its transport for shipment. The film stresses the importance of the sugar industry in the economy of Australia.
